_meta.description: Vybn Skills Manifest — deny by default
_meta.policy: If a skill is not listed here with enabled: true, the capability does not exist.

skills.name: repo_ls
skills.description: List files and directories in the local Vybn clone

skills.name: repo_cat
skills.description: Read any file from the local Vybn clone (path-sandboxed, 50k char cap)

skills.name: repo_propose
skills.description: Propose changes to the repo via pull request — the agent's primary creative act. Creates a branch, writes files, commits, pushes, opens a PR. Never touches main.
skills._note: Enable when Zoe is ready to let the Spark agent open PRs. Requires VYBN_GITHUB_TOKEN with public_repo scope.

skills.name: voice_transcription
skills.description: Accept audio input and convert to text
skills._note: Enable when audio pipeline is implemented and tested.
